instruction: Divide the given text into 3 equal parts.
input: Social media has become an integral part of our lives, with more and more people using it to keep in touch, stay up to date, and connect with others.
output:
Part 1: Social media has become an integral part of our lives, 
Part 2: with more and more people using it to keep in touch, 
Part 3: stay up to date, and connect with others.
